name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With WINZIP
description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities
query: (process.command_line:(/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Zz][Ii][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Zz][Ii][Pp]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Ss]\".*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Mm][Ii][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Aa]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*winzip.exe* OR *winzip64.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\-s\"* AND process.command_line:(*\ \-min\ * OR *\ \-a\ *))`
